response.homeDescription: Great home for a first time OR move-up buyer. Single story home on a mature tree lined street, nice large front yard, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms / 2-car garage. Entry leading into living room with tiled fireplace. Kitchen with upgraded cabinets, countertops with an eating area. Ceramic tile flooring throughout living/kitchen areas. Rear yard with covered patio and block wall fencing. *NEW INTERIOR PAINT, CARPET are already complete and NEW APPLIANCES will be installed at COE!
response.whatOwnerLoves: Open the door to this open floor plan completely remodeled. This lovely 3 bedroom 1.75 bath has it all. At the end of a beautiful tree lined culdesac, lies this lovely 3 bedroom 1.75 bath. The kitchen and bathrooms have been completely remodeled. The kitchen features granite counter tops and lots of cupboard space. Both bathrooms have been upgraded and re-piped. The bedrooms are all nicely sized and have good amounts of closet space. Both the front and back yards are wonderfully landscaped for ease of care and pleasing to the eye. When the skies are clear, you will even get a glimpse of the mountains. Come and see!
